/* CommonCode.xml -> selectCommonCodeMasterInfo */ SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY HEAD_CD) ROWNUM ,HEAD_CD ,HEAD_ID ,HEAD_NM ,HEAD_EN ,HEAD_FR ,HEAD_4TH ,REF_CHR1 ,REF_CHR2 ,REF_CHR3 ,REF_CHR4 ,REF_CHR5 ,REF_NUM1 ,REF_NUM2 ,REF_NUM3 ,REF_NUM4 ,REF_NUM5 ,REMARKS ,STATUS FROM BC_COMM_H WHERE 1 = 1
AND HEAD_CD LIKE SetParam(#{S_HEAD_CD})
AND HEAD_EN LIKE setParam(#{S_HEAD_NM})
AND HEAD_FR LIKE setParam(#{S_HEAD_NM})
AND HEAD_NM LIKE setParam(#{S_HEAD_NM})

/* CommonCode.xml -> selectCommonCodeDetailInfo */ SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PRIORITY) ROWNUM ,HEAD_CD ,CODE ,READ_CD ,CODE_NM ,CODE_EN ,CODE_FR ,CODE_4TH ,REF_CHR1 ,REF_CHR2 ,REF_CHR3 ,REF_CHR4 ,REF_CHR5 ,REF_NUM1 ,REF_NUM2 ,REF_NUM3 ,REF_NUM4 ,REF_NUM5 ,PRIORITY ,STATUS FROM BC_COMM_L WHERE HEAD_CD = #{HEAD_CD}

/* Common.xml -> selectCommonCodeByRef */ SELECT A.HEAD_ID HEAD_ID ,GetHeadNm(A.HEAD_ID, #{languageCode}) HEAD_NM ,GetCodeNm(A.HEAD_ID, B.CODE, #{languageCode}) CODE_NM ,B.READ_CD + ' - ' +GetCodeNm(A.HEAD_ID, B.CODE, #{languageCode}) S_CODE_NM ,B.READ_CD CODE ,B.CODE REFVALUE ,B.REF_CNT CNT ,B.REF_CHR1 REF1 ,B.REF_CHR2 REF2 ,B.REF_CHR3 REF3 FROM BC_COMM_H A INNER JOIN BC_COMM_L B ON B.HEAD_CD = A.HEAD_CD WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND A.HEAD_ID = #{HEAD_ID} AND B.CODE LIKE #{CODE} + '%' ORDER BY B.PRIORITY ASC
